name: Breakout (itch) (Beard Inc)
description:
A brick-breaker based off the original Breakout game from 1976.  The aim is to break all the bricks at the top of the screen by bouncing a ball off you platform which you control. This can be controlled by moving your mouse or the WASD/arrow keys. For the keyboard option, you can also adjust your speed to your liking. When in the game, press escape to pause the game from where you can exit or go back to the menu (or resume of course). Free to play - Have fun!

P.S. If you would like to download this game to your computer to either be able to access it easier or be able to save your highscore, there is a ZIP file containing the downloadable game with more instructions on the download page.
